name: Cookin'Monkeys
description:
/!\ DISCLAIMER THERE ARE SOME RANDOM CRASH IN THE BROWSER VERSION /!\ 
For a better exprerience, download an launch the executable.

Take on the role of a cute monkey chef and create the best banana cakes in " Cookin' Monkeys " !  Compete with other players through various mini-games to expand your cooking space and level up your monkeys, and see how your cooking skills evolve !

Players can challenge each others on a player board, where they can compare scores and become the best monkey chef ! With adorable graphics and an endless progression, Cookin Monkey is the perfect game for both casual and competitive players who love cooking, monkeys, and having fun!

Mini games rules and controls :
Flour weighting : use the scale to get to the right amount of flour ! but be careful not to overfill it !
Egg catching : use "Q" and "D" to move and collect eggs falling from the nest by catching them in your basket ! don't let them break on the floor !
Sugar digging : walk through the forest to find sugar for your cakes ! watch out for the rocks on your way !
Cow milking : collect milk from the cow in your bucket ! make sure not to hurt her !
Banana crushing : crush the bananas coming through the screen ! try to get them all !
Banana picking : use your slingshot and aim for the bananas on the trees ! but dont miss too much or you'll run out of rock to throws !
Butter melting : melt the butter on your pan by using a match ! be cautious not to burn it !
